com.pixelmed.dicom

Class ShortStringAttribute

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pixelmed.dicom.Attribute
      • com.pixelmed.dicom.StringAttribute
        • com.pixelmed.dicom.StringAttributeAffectedBySpecificCharacterSet
          • com.pixelmed.dicom.ShortStringAttribute

  • public class ShortStringAttribute
extends StringAttributeAffectedBySpecificCharacterSet

    A concrete class specializing Attribute for Short String (SH) attributes.

    Though an instance of this class may be created using its constructors, there is also a factory class, AttributeFactory.

    See Also:
    Attribute, AttributeFactory, AttributeList
